content: And just to provide some context on how big that opportunity is for Constellation in America, just extending the life of Constellation's clean energy units, not all the units in the country, just ours, just extending ours will create as much clean power for America to fight the climate crisis as all of the renewable energy that's been built in America over the last 40 years. Your line is open. One moment for our next question. Your line is open. One moment for our next question. Your line is open. One moment for our next question. Your line is open.
